title: IBG changes on PBE
body:
Riot: Rather than nerf IBG for all champs except Ezreal, can you perhaps consider changing the current strategy on its usage to the following:
Split the passive.
      - Spellblade (unique passive) - leave it at 125% base AD, remove the icy zone component.
      - Icy zone (unique passive, melee only) - on spell cast, slow for 2 sec's blah blah blah.

This still allows champs to utilise IBG as an armour, mana, cdr item with a spellblade passive.
It removes the less than desirable 'Blue Ez' build from wrecking every champ he goes against by having the Icy Zone passive melee only so those champs who have to work to get in range can use it while those that are ranged cannot use it.

You could rename the Icy Zone passive to the same name as FroMal's so its one or the other, not both.

Problem solved.

_Your welcome_
